divs: Sighting Details I was going for a quick drive to the local creamery, heard the sound of (fighter)jets wich only lasted around 40 sec; looked up, no sight of the jets. I was obout to get inside my truck while looking up and thats when I saw them, flying side by side, then 2 drop back forming a triangle, then the lead ufo droped back forming the same triangle but with 2 leading the formation. they seem to be white but were to far up to really be true on the color. 2 out of 3 other witness saw them but after they had spread out (ufo's). I ran to get my camera started recording, jus to my surprise it had no memory card in it. I had to go and the objects stayed there completly still. I was wondering if anyone heard, saw, or read anything that had to with jets been scramble near Stockton, California.
Summary: 3 UFO's flying in various formations and separating to a stop.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There were no other sightings in Stockton on or around April 10th 2011
